sentences.sentence: The policy of the annually balanced budget represents a rigid straightjacket.
sentences.translation: 年度平衡预算的政策是一种刻板的束缚。

sentences.sentence: Rafa Benitez has always been a fan of Silva but the financial straightjacket he works in at Anfield is likely to prohibit any deal.
sentences.translation: 贝尼特斯一直都青睐于席尔瓦，但是他在安菲尔德的财政缩小让他难以达成任何交易。

sentences.sentence: Instead of forcing all Unicode characters into a 2 -, 3 -, or 4-byte straightjacket, UTF-8 admits 1-byte (8-bit) to 4-byte encodings.
sentences.translation: UTF - 8并没有迫使所有unicode字符挤入2字节、3字节或者4字节中，它允许对1字节(8位)到4字节进行编码。
